com.jb.couponsystem.repo

Interface CompanyRepo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Company,java.lang.Long>

    public interface CompanyRepo
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>
    This interface contains query methods that refer to the company objects in the database.
    Author:
    Alexander Zablotsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean existsByCompanyName(java.lang.String companyName)
      This method checks if a company with a given name exists in the database.
      Company findByName(java.lang.String companyName)
      This method finds and returns company object in the database by its name received as a parameter from the outside.
      Company findByNameAndPwd(java.lang.String companyName, java.lang.String password)
      This method finds and returns company object in the database by its name and password received as parameters from the outside.
      java.util.List<Company> findCompanyByCompanyName(java.lang.String companyName)
      This method finds companies from the database by company name received as a parameter from the outside and returns them as list of objects.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

        count, delete, delete, delete, deleteAll, exists, findAll, findAll, findOne, save, save

    • Method Detail

      • findCompanyByCompanyName

        java.util.List<Company> findCompanyByCompanyName(java.lang.String companyName)
        This method finds companies from the database by company name received as a parameter from the outside and returns them as list of objects.
        Parameters:
        companyName - company name
        Returns:
        list of companies

      • existsByCompanyName

        @Query(value="SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(c) > 0 THEN \'true\' ELSE \'false\' END FROM COMPANIES c WHERE c.companyName = :companyName")
boolean existsByCompanyName(@Param(value="companyName")
                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String companyName)
        This method checks if a company with a given name exists in the database. It returns true if it exists, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        companyName - company name
        Returns:
        true if a company with a given name exists, false otherwise

      • findByName

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM COMPANIES WHERE COMPANY_NAME = :companyName",
       nativeQuery=true)
Company findByName(@Param(value="companyName")
                                                                                                                        java.lang.String companyName)
        This method finds and returns company object in the database by its name received as a parameter from the outside.
        Parameters:
        companyName - company name
        Returns:
        company object

      • findByNameAndPwd

        @Query(value="SELECT c FROM COMPANIES c WHERE c.companyName = :companyName AND c.password = :password")
Company findByNameAndPwd(@Param(value="companyName")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String companyName,
                                                                                                                                  @Param(value="password")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String password)
        This method finds and returns company object in the database by its name and password received as parameters from the outside.
        Parameters:
        companyName - company name
        password - company's password
        Returns:
        company object
